# CV-Auto - 21Datas CV Maker

## Project Overview
A Next.js application for automating CV creation in the 21Datas brand style. Features a split-screen layout with a CV preview on the left and a Gemini AI-powered chat on the right.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router and TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Google Gemini API for AI-powered CV parsing
- html2canvas + jsPDF for PDF export

## Key Features
- Paste raw CV content into chat, AI extracts and structures data
- Real-time CV preview matching 21Datas brand design
- PDF export of the generated CV
- Split-screen layout: CV preview (left) + Chat (right)

## Design Guidelines
- Primary color: #2563EB (blue)
- Clean, professional layout with timeline markers
- Two-column CV layout: Experience/Projects on left, Skills/References on right
- Circular profile photo placeholder with blue border
- Blue horizontal rules for section separators
